mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, user_id, product_id, content, rating FROM comment WHERE product_id = #{value} ORDER BY comment_id DESC
SELECT comment_id, user_id, product_id, content, rating FROM comment ORDER BY comment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( user_id, product_id, content, rating ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{content}, #{rating} )
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, user_id, product_id, content, rating FROM comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}

SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.product_id, c.content, c.rating, (SELECT AVG(c3.rating) FROM comment c3 WHERE c3.product_id = c.product_id) AS product_avg_rating, p.product_id, p.name, p.price, CASE WHEN d.discount_id IS NOT NULL THEN p.price * (100 - d.rate) / 100 ELSE p.price END AS final_price, p.image, c2.category_name, p.count, p.sold_count, p.description, d.rate, d.type FROM comment c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN category c2 ON pc.category_id = c2.category_id LEFT JOIN discount d ON p.product_id = d.product_id AND d.is_active = 1 AND NOW() BETWEEN d.start_date AND d.end_date WHERE c.user_id = #{value} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
